name: axiao-blog
description: 船新版本阿孝 - 一个基于 React + TypeScript + Vite + Tailwind CSS 构建的现代化多页面个人博客应用

scripts.build: echo 'Building for production...' && mkdir -p dist && cp index.html dist/
scripts.build:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development BRANCH=dev npm run build
scripts.build:dev2: cross-env NODE_ENV=development BRANCH=dev2 npm run build
scripts.build:staging: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging BRANCH=staging npm run build
scripts.build:production: cross-env NODE_ENV=production BRANCH=production npm run build

author: 船新版本阿孝
